tooltip.witcher-medallions.wolfmedallion: Symbol of the mighty warriors of Kaer Morhen
tooltip.witcher-medallions.catmedalliont: Symbol of the agile butchers of Dyn Marv
tooltip.witcher-medallions.bearmedallion: Symbol of the fierce fighters of Haern Caduch
tooltip.witcher-medallions.griffinmedall: Symbol of the wise knights of Kaer Seren
tooltip.witcher-medallions.vipermedallio: Symbol of the ruthless assassins of Gorthur Gvaed
tooltip.witcher-medallions.manticoremeda: Symbol of the enigmatic swordsmen of Zerrikania
tooltip.witcher-medallions.ancientwolfme: A symbol of Kaer Morhen, from a forgotten age
text.config.witchermedallions-config.opt: Detectable mobs with the Witcher Medallions

Add or remove mobs for detection! 
The format is 'entity.<ModId>.<EntityId>'

Size (XYZ) for the active detection.
(When you press the keybind)

Size (XZ) for the passive detection.
(Small motion animation)

Size (Y) for the passive detection.
It must be less than or equal to XZ size.
